import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export function Users(){ const [users, setUsers] = useState([{ Name:"Kavin",Email:"kavin123@gmail.com",Phone:"9629187123",Location:"Coimbatore" }]) useEffect return( <>
Add + { users.map((user) => { return }) }

); }
